attributes.action: to ensure that all migrants into this country whether under asylum or otherwise wait an equal amount of time for subsidised social housing as UK citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unfair to UK cicitzens that they are forced to wait for affordable social housing (in some cases for several years) while housing authorities are obliged to house all immigrants regardless of status within the country.

It is time the governement realised that it should put the needs of its own citizens BEFORE the needs of the rest of the world.

as the law currently stands, UK citizens have no priority in the housing system and as such often have to wait considerably longer than immigrants.
